author: Charles Duan
title: How Could Facebook Have Been So Careless?
text:
The Cambridge Analytica-Facebook data revelations have set off a vigorous round of blame-shifting among the political consulting firm, the social network and Aleksandr Kogan, the academic who transmitted data between them.
Facebook bears the lion’s share of responsibility for allowing millions of users’ profile information to land in the hands of a private consultancy—but not for the reasons others have claimed.
